title: Home Flip
description: Home Flip is a casual arcade game where you are too tired to walk but you need to get to your comfy bed. Leap and somersault through your house, dodging obstacles like tables, chairs, and lamps on your way to bed. Remember the golden rule: DON'T TOUCH THE FLOOR! Master the art of backflips with easy clicks/taps, and enjoy dozens of fun levels, addictive gameplay, and quirky ragdoll physics. Turn your home into a flipping playground!
